Considering the user's preference for war stories and singers, I would recommend "Flyboys" or "Catch-22".

Flyboys depicts a group of young men volunteering for the French military and becoming the first fighter pilots, highlighting the theme of war and sacrifice.

Catch-22 focuses on a man desperately trying to be certified insane during World War II, exploring the absurdity of human nature and the psychological effects of trauma.
